AX_01.description: Images should have an alt attribute, unless they have an ARIA role of presentation
AX_01.name: imageWithoutAltText

AX_02.description: Avoid positive values for Tab index
AX_02.name: avoidPositiveTabIndex

AX_03.description: Check if the current Element has an invalid ARIA attribute
AX_03.name: invalidAriaAttribute

AX_04.description: Check if element ID is unique
AX_04.name: isIdUnique

AX_05.description: An element's ID must not be present in more that one aria-owns attribute at any time
AX_05.name: isIdInAria_OwnsUnique

AX_06.description: Any ID referred to via an IDREF must be unique in the DOM
AX_06.name: isIdInIdRefUnique

AX_07.description: The webpage should have a title that describes topic or purpose
AX_07.name: hasTitle

AX_10.description: Provide a caption via the CAPTION element. A table CAPTION describes the table in one to three sentences
AX_10.name: hasCaption

AX_11.description: Elements with ARIA roles must use a valid, non-abstract ARIA role.
AX_11.name: hasValidAriaRole

AX_12.description: The web page should have the content's human language indicated in the markup. Identify the primary natural language of the document
AX_12.name: hasLangAttribute

AX_13.description: There should be only one main element for a web page document
AX_13.name: hasMoreThanOneRoleMain

AX_14.description: Presence of Title attribute for ABBR, OBJECT, APPLET, MAP, ACRONYM and A. Specify the expansion of each abbreviation or acronym in a document where it first occurs
AX_14.name: hasTitleAttribute

AX_15.description: Certain reserved elements do not support ARIA roles, states and properties
AX_15.name: isAriaOnReservedElement

AX_16.description: Avoid Deprecated features of W3C technologies
AX_16.name: isDeprecatedElement

AX_17.description: Avoid using the style attribute and defining styles inline and move them to stylesheets instead
AX_17.name: hasInlineStyles

AX_18.description: Until user agents handle empty controls correctly, include default placeholding characters in edit boxes and text areas and form elements that can take default values
AX_18.name: hasDefaultPlaceholderTexts

AX_19.description: Associate labels explicitly with their controls
AX_19.name: hasLabels

AX_20.description: Until user agents provide the ability to stop the refresh, do not create periodically auto-refreshing / auto re-direct pages
AX_20.name: hasAutoRefresh

AX_21.description: Until user agents allow users to turn off spawned windows, do not cause pop-ups or other windows to appear and do not change the current window without informing the user.
AX_21.name: isOpeningInNewTabOrPopUp

AX_22.description: Ensure that pages are usable when scripts, applets, or other programmatic objects are turned off or not supported. If this is not possible, provide equivalent information on an alternative accessible page
AX_22.name: hasNoScriptTag

AX_23.description: Provide keyboard shortcuts to important links (including those in client-side image maps), form controls, and groups of form controls
AX_23.name: hasAccessKeyEnabled

AX_24.description: Check if there is atleast one header section / element for the page content that defines its purpose & context
AX_24.name: hasHeaderElementDefined

AX_25.description: role=main must be present on significant elements only
AX_25.name: isRoleMainOnSignificantElement

AX_26.description: Provide metadata to add semantic information to pages and sites. Check if there is a meta tag with charset, keywords, description, author, copyright attributes defined
AX_26.name: hasRequiredMetaAttributes

AX_27.description: Check if there is a link that helps skip irrelevant information and land the user at the main content
AX_27.name: hasLinkToSkipToMainContent

AX_28.description: Check if PRE elements are used. Ensure that there are no TABLE based layouts in it
AX_28.name: isPreElementUsed

AX_29.description: Don't use the <B> and <I> tags. They are used to create a visual presentation effect
AX_29.name: isBorIElementUsed

AX_30.description: Provide text equivalent for every non-text element like OBJECT
AX_30.name: hasTextEquivalent

AX_31.description: Ensure that equivalents for dynamic content are updated when the dynamic content changes. As the contents of a frame changes, so must change any description. This is not possible if an IMG is inserted directly into a frame. Thus, content developers should always make the source ('src') of a frame an HTML file
AX_31.name: hasImgInSrcOfUrl

AX_32.description: Use FIELDSET to group form controls into semantic units
AX_32.name: isFormElementInsideFieldSet

AX_33.description: Describe the FIELDSET group with the LEGEND element.
AX_33.name: isFieldsetContainsLegend

AX_34.description: Check for presence of a DOCTYPE
AX_34.name: hasDoctype

AX_35.description: Table TD tags are to be associated to corresponding TH header tags of the table via the headers attribute
AX_35.name: hasHeadersAttribute

AX_36.description: Any element that has click, double click handlers must be focusable and not hidden
AX_36.name: isFocusibleOnClickAndDoubleClick

AX_37.description: Anchor element with target _blank should have an hidden label opens in a new window ot tab
AX_37.name: anchorWithTargetblank
